title: News24.com | WATCH | 2 doctors allegedly forced into quarantine after claim of 'bringing coronavirus to Limpopo'
description: Two doctors in Limpopo are living in fear after they were allegedly forced into quarantine at a medical facility by the Limpopo government after testing positive for Covid-19 on Sunday.
content:
Two doctors in Limpopo are living in fear after they were allegedly forced into quarantine at a medical facility by the Limpopo government on Thursday after testing positive for Covid-19 on Sunday.
The Limpopo health department is seemingly ignoring recommen… [+4931 chars]
